title: Still didn't get the Xayah + Rakan icon.
body:
Hi there.

I'm here to claim my Xayah and Rakan icon (even tho it isn't much, giving a champ to someone for 6300 IP during the gifting offer is a lot tbh), I was supposed to get this icon in two weeks after the gift.
http://imgur.com/a2ZBsTR

I've even talked about it in this topic:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Er4s8E1n-rakan-and-xayahs-summoners-icon?comment=0000000000000000

It's written April 27th, but with time zone and all, I can assure you that I did send the gift before the end of the event, and I got told that I would still get it, even if my friend didn't open the gift yet. It's been a while now that I didn't get the icon.

Can you help me?

replies.body:
Hey there again Edenn! Still thinking Xayah is bae?

Check your icons again, a certain poro brotha might have left a little something something in there for ya
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 


BTW: How're you liking this new event?

Thanks Broporo, still awesome

Oh. About this event.

...I keep begging for Dawnbringer Riven to friends cuz I'm broke
(tfw you don't have your own credit card)
ayy, my friends gifted me both the skins :D

> [{quoted}](name=UprisingRival,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=rWlZuYFT,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-19T16:14:05.112+0000)
>
> ayy, my friends gifted me both the skins :D

Can you tell your friend to gift me Dawnbringer Riven? :(

Oh, and Broporo, I think that Xayah is still bae (I don't really feel the nerf)
(tfw Xayah will be nerfed next patch cuz I said that)

I'll be sure not to mention anything about Xayah around the office. Her bf just got a sort of buff (fixed his shield scaling) and I'd be upset if they buffed him and nerfed his girl xD!

BTW: I took a peek at your account since you mentioned wanting that skin so badly. Looks to me like you already have enough to buy it ;)

I actually never thought you would actually give me 2000 RP just so I can buy this skin. I have now a reason to main Riven.
That's awesome, thanks !
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

EDIT: I could even buy a chest and a key, along with order's token, so again, thanks you !
